item.title: Django and Bootstrap: basic setup
item.description: The purpose here is to create a basic setup of a Django project already integrated with Bootstrap and Font Awesome, which can be the base of your projects. If you want to check out the code, just go to the Github repository page here. Create the Django project First of all, we create the project root directory ~: $ mkdir project ~: $ cd project/ So, we set up a Python virtual environment called venv where we will install the dependencies of our project.
